---
title: "Toronto Gardeners Survey 2018 in COVID Context"
author: "Shirin Arghandeh"
date: '2020-05-20'
output: word_document
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
# Importing and reading survey data.
gardener_data <- read_excel("togardener_survey18.xls", col_names = TRUE)
# Subbing NA for "No" in row entries.
gardener_data[is.na(gardener_data)] = "No"
str(gardener_data)
attach(gardener_data)
```


Creating cross-tabulations of variables garden type and duration of growing food.
```{r, include=TRUE}
source("http://pcwww.liv.ac.uk/~william/R/crosstab.r")

crosstab(gardener_data, row.vars = "balcony_garden", col.vars = "growing_duration", type = "f")
crosstab(gardener_data, row.vars = "landlord_garden", col.vars = "growing_duration", type = "f")

```
